data: The organization Global Scholars is an institution.
The organization Global Scholars operates in the education industry.
The organization Global Scholars focuses on providing accessible, high-quality education to learners around the world.
The organization Global Scholars values excellence, inclusivity, and global citizenship.
The organization Global Scholars is located in Boston, Massachusetts, USA.
The organization Global Scholars was founded in 2005.
The organization Global Scholars has a student population of 500-1000 students.
The organization Global Scholars has partnered with universities and governments to launch online degree programs and professional development courses.
